attributes.action: Hold a General Election within the first quarter of 2009
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, citizens of the United Kingdom, feel that the current PM is in power against the wishes of the majority. This is undemocratic, even more so due to the unelected nature of the current administration. Are we not supposed to be a democratic nation?

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
